description: Replaces an IP access list, specified by its ID.

ip_access_list_id.description: The ID for the corresponding IP access list

list_type.description: Type of IP access list. Valid values are as follows and are case-sensitive:

ALLOW.description: : An allow list. Include this IP or range.

BLOCK.description: : A block list. Exclude this IP or range. IP addresses in the block list are excluded even if they are included in an allow list.

enabled.description: Specifies whether this IP access list is enabled.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

403.description: Caller does not have permission to execute the specified operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.
